Question 1
```{r }
install.packages("haven")
library(haven)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse) ## dplyr provides the join functions
library(dplyr)
younglives_peru_wealth <- read_sav("Data/younglives_peru_wealth.sav") # set path
View(younglives_peru_wealth) #read data 
younglives_peru <- read_excel("Data/younglives_peru.xlsx")
View(younglives_peru)
#Using keys to join data with dplyr
#http://stat545.com/bit001_dplyr-cheatsheet.html

(joined_table <- inner_join(younglives_peru_wealth, younglives_peru))

```
Question 2
```{r }
library(magrittr)
#Select only the variables measuring wealth index, childid, childâ€™s language, and receptive vocabulary (ppvtraw).
# Select columns by name
(joined_table %>% select(wi, childid, CHLANG, ppvtraw))

```
Question 3
```{r }
(select_from_joined %>% drop_na())
```
